text: Na babandi babangikanyije (Allah) baravuze bati "Iyo Allah aza kubishaka, yaba twe cyangwa ababyeyi bacu, nta kindi twari gusenga mu cyimbo cye, ndetse nta nâ€™icyo twari kuziririzaataziririje we ubwe". Uko ni na ko abababanjirije babigenje. Nonese hari ikindi intumwa zishinzwe kitari ugusohoza ubutumwa mu buryo bugaragara
